h2_title: Where to use Skandha of Feeling Black Myth: Wukong
content: The Skandha of Feeling can be taken to Mount Huago in Chapter 6, alongside the Skandha of Form, Skandha of Thought, Skandha of Choice. Upon accessing the Cloud ability in this chapter, you can head towards a massive enemy in the distance - the Son of Stones. Fly past this boss, to find a small path leading to the Giant Shigandang.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Skandha_of_Feeling.md', within the main section titled 'Skandha of Feeling', specifically from the subsection 'Where to use Skandha of Feeling Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
The Skandha of Feeling can be taken to Mount Huago in Chapter 6, alongside the Skandha of Form, Skandha of Thought, Skandha of Choice. Upon accessing the Cloud ability in this chapter, you can head towards a massive enemy in the distance - the Son of Stones. Fly past this boss, to find a small path leading to the Giant Shigandang.
